subtitles:
44172 47453 [Girl] People once believed
that when someone dies...

47532 51652 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

55013 60053 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

63133 67935 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

119980 124299 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

124379 127500 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

130939 134741 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

137059 140140 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

141581 144300 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

144380 149061 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

151901 155103 [Man] You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

155182 159782 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

159862 162063 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

162103 164863 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

164943 167423 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

167503 170823 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

170903 173783 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

181664 185704 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

185784 187905 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

187985 191746 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

204145 208027 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

208067 211226 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
217388 219546 You lied to her about Eric.

221228 224788 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

235789 241269 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.

262792 266671 [Sarah] A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

266751 269512 I used to think that was true
about everything...

273873 277674 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

277713 281913 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

318596 321677 What are you,
like the night watchman?

342118 345357 You know, what this place
needs is a...

347759 351999 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

352039 354919 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
354999 357200 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
357280 360199 Hey, hey, let me do it.

360279 364161 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

364201 366561 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

366601 368480 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

377881 381563 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

381642 385401 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

387282 390802 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

390882 393962 - They make you fart big time.
- [Chuckling]

400044 402644 [Man] You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

402724 405244 from all the crap
floating around in it.

406364 409964 I wish I could have seen that.
[Whistling]

509652 513412 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

535455 538696 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

545655 548136 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

555857 558417 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

558497 561658 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- [Woman Shouting]

673188 677587 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.

745194 748633 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

751834 756114 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

759634 761555 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

764634 768196 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?

791998 796118 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

796198 799919 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

799999 802958 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
803038 805718 Fire it up! Fire it up!

808839 810720 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

844682 848043 - I love you.
- Say that again.
918408 921808 * It doesn't matter how you hide *
921888 925088 * We find you if we're wanting to *

927369 931049 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

931089 935131 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *

970173 974013 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
976414 980733 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

985255 987774 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

987854 990575 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

999056 1002096 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- [Siren Wailing]

1005096 1007376 Close the gate
when you go out!

1007456 1010016 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1012577 1015858 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1020377 1024658 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.
1044699 1049300 * That point me to another day *

1125427 1128427 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1178632 1181153 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1181233 1185152 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1185232 1188513 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1188553 1191032 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1191112 1195752 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1195833 1200593 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1206033 1211594 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1220436 1225155 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1225236 1229676 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1234196 1236636 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1271480 1277120 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *

1284681 1288840 - Look at this mess!
What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.
1293802 1295841 * No, they don't have to take you *

1295921 1298560 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1298640 1303042 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1303122 1306282 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1307363 1309203 Give me some of that
over there!

1311363 1314923 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1314963 1319564 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1319604 1323285 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1323365 1327404 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1327444 1331365 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1372569 1377047 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1413292 1419172 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1425533 1428573 [Man] Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1446415 1451735 - [Clearing Throat]
- I told you to stay out of here.

1451775 1455295 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1455375 1459255 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1464897 1467777 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.
1491179 1493539 Who the fuck is this now?

1500299 1503978 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1511260 1515341 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1522702 1526901 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1526941 1530742 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."

1537583 1541542 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1543862 1546705 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1577186 1582266 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1583826 1587148 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1589747 1593268 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1600347 1603188 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1603268 1606189 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1606269 1608949 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1609029 1613029 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1613109 1617630 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1617710 1619550 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1619630 1623229 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1624389 1626710 What the hell
do you call that?

1630270 1633911 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1633951 1636631 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1645952 1648472 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1648512 1651312 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1651392 1655592 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1655672 1660953 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1664394 1666874 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1683075 1687116 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1710038 1712838 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1715958 1718678 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1718758 1721279 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1721359 1723639 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1723719 1728600 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1735319 1737960 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1738040 1740600 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1742199 1745440 Each one of these is a life...

1754202 1758202 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1766482 1770523 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1772323 1776244 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1776324 1779803 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1803246 1806566 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1813487 1817767 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1832048 1835809 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1835889 1840849 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1844130 1848329 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1848409 1851410 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1853210 1856250 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1856330 1860170 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1862850 1867291 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1867331 1871971 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1872051 1876333 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1876413 1878733 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1878813 1883213 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1883293 1885772 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1885852 1889213 - [Looter] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1889293 1894414 - [Glass Shattering]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1894494 1898014 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1916215 1918696 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1918776 1920977 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1921057 1926657 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

1934698 1937777 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1937857 1941938 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1976661 1980461 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1980541 1983621 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1983701 1985381 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1988102 1991302 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1991342 1993542 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1993622 1998023 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1998063 2000543 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2000623 2003663 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2006224 2008704 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2008784 2011463 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.

2014265 2018145 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2018225 2022505 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2022585 2024345 Call it my need to know.

2064028 2067188 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2070908 2075029 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2075109 2078031 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2081990 2086550 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2087671 2091031 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2107272 2111672 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2111752 2115911 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2119353 2123393 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"

2125515 2128275 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2128355 2132275 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2132355 2137995 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2138074 2141475 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2141555 2145395 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2152117 2155716 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2157877 2162437 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2197240 2200759 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2224642 2227162 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **

2263886 2268246 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2274847 2277767 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2285369 2290008 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2291929 2296649 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2320250 2322852 Stop me if you heard this one.

2330933 2333572 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2337133 2339293 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2344573 2348974 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2351093 2355014 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2378257 2380176 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2383096 2385696 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2417700 2422020 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2422100 2426661 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2436661 2441261 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2469824 2473345 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2476624 2479864 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2493988 2496468 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2496548 2498908 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2498988 2501787 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2501867 2504546 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2557579 2563100 [Man On Radio] As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2563140 2565779 - [Door Squeaking]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2565859 2568699 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2568779 2571618 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2571658 2573738 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2573818 2575858 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2575938 2580497 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2583458 2586816 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2592817 2596375 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2596455 2598615 You still have your hat on.
2613813 2617933 are you some kind of... ghost?

2627171 2631531 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2633451 2637370 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2637450 2640410 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2640490 2644890 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2647568 2651728 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2651808 2654889 Her body finally just gave it up.

2654929 2658648 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2685403 2687404 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2687484 2692723 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2692803 2697364 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2697404 2700242 Give me something
I could work with.

2704882 2707282 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2707362 2710562 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2710642 2713960 would talk after
what happened to you?

2717200 2719760 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2725559 2729838 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2734519 2738357 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2738437 2741797 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2753996 2758275 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2762755 2765834 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2769314 2771913 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2774833 2780432 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2791071 2794430 [Gideon] I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2794510 2797511 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2797591 2800510 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2800590 2803709 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2803749 2806189 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2806269 2810508 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2815469 2817827 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2817907 2820307 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2820387 2825667 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2828466 2833346 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2840345 2842664 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2842744 2844664 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2844704 2848224 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2848304 2852103 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2852183 2856142 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2858823 2863783 Eyes see. It's one of the most important
things I learned from my sister.

2863863 2866982 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [Laughing]

2870341 2873381 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2873461 2875620 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2875700 2879060 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2879180 2882500 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2882580 2885819 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

2888098 2891738 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

2894818 2899297 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2899376 2903578 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2903618 2906217 I ain't making all this up.

2906297 2910617 I ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

2918856 2923654 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2933494 2936373 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2945292 2947491 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2950131 2954810 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

2954890 2958651 I'll have the janitor
come on up.
3027402 3029242 * It can't rain all the time *

3042360 3044960 [T-bird] I don't know how many times I
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3045040 3047840 One part falls, it all falls!

3047920 3051239 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3051279 3053758 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fucking voodoo doll!

3058836 3062878 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3112632 3116071 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3143187 3146307 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3156907 3161145 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? I got it.

3162705 3165465 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3165545 3168504 - This is business, right?
- [Gun Cocks] Faster.

3175424 3177742 I hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3179263 3182142 - What in the crap--
- [Tires Screech, Siren Wails]

3188262 3190862 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3196221 3199060 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3204861 3207499 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3226337 3228457 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3239096 3243174 - [Engine Rattling]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3255933 3259493 Oh, I hate this.
This ain't good.

3281650 3284770 But I don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3284810 3287490 What are you talking about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3287530 3290529 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, I remember her.

3290569 3292649 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3292729 3295847 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3295927 3299368 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3299448 3302726 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3302806 3305927 It's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3306007 3310726 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3321286 3326284 I know you. I know you.
I knew I knew you.

3326324 3330245 I knew I knew you.
But you ain't you.

3330405 3334163 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3334243 3337564 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3337604 3339883 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3344321 3347161 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3356961 3359801 and felt how awful goodness is."

3426913 3429111 [Woman] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3429191 3431431 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3431471 3435672 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night"...

3435753 3439031 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3439111 3444270 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3444310 3449270 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3449350 3452828 The mayor has fire fighters
from all surrounding counties--

3452908 3456549 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3458508 3461107 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3461187 3465907 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when I was five.

3465987 3469946 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3470026 3473226 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3473266 3478186 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3483826 3488866 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3491264 3495385 Oh, forget it. I never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3519062 3521861 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3521941 3525061 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3525140 3529179 - We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3531180 3533059 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3544698 3548097 I got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3551376 3553697 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3553777 3557496 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3557576 3559617 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3559697 3562456 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3562496 3565335 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3565415 3567255 and you're saying this is
just a fucking automobile accident?

3567335 3569536 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3569616 3571534 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
3571614 3573533 You gotta write that shit down.

3575494 3578454 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3578494 3582292 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3641085 3643806 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

3737913 3741514 You said,
"Can't rain all the time."
3741594 3744713 That is from your song, right?

3754232 3757232 - [Cawing]
- Come on, Eric. I know you're here.

3771470 3775909 The hell with you.
I thought you cared.

3791868 3795067 But he looked different. He was painted
up white like some kind of dead whore.

3795147 3798266 I seen him. T-bird sent me in
for some road beers, right?

3798346 3800786 Then he took him away.
But I chased him down.

3800866 3803545 And he flash fried T-bird
to his fucking car!

3807066 3810825 Maybe we oughta just videotape this.
Play it back in slow motion.

3812104 3816504 - Fire it up! Fire it up!
- You see the grave?

3824624 3827742 He's working his way back
to this speed freak right here.

3830422 3833461 That boy was out of control.
T-bird, he came in, he says...
[Whistles]
